TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class PagedDataSource : System.Collections.ICollection, System.ComponentModel.ITypedList

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PagedDataSource extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.ComponentModel.ITypedList
Public NotInheritable Class PagedDataSource Implements ICollection, ITypedList
public ref class PagedDataSource sealed : System::Collections::ICollection, System::ComponentModel::ITypedList

summary.span: 封裝資料繫結控制項 (例如 、、 和 ) 的分頁相關屬性，以允許控制項執行分頁。

span.span: Encapsulates the paging-related properties of a data-bound control (such as , , , and ) that allow it to perform paging.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會封裝屬性，讓資料來源控制項，例如， ， ，和，若要執行分頁。The class encapsulates the properties that allow data-source controls, such as the , , , and , to perform paging. 這個類別是由控制項開發人員使用，提供分頁支援自訂的資料繫結控制項時。This class is used by control developers when providing paging support to a custom data-bound control. 這個類別會使用可用的最佳方法來列舉屬於目前頁面的資料。This class uses the best available method to enumerate over the data belonging to the current page. 如果基礎資料來源支援索引的存取 (例如和)，這個類別會使用它。If the underlying data source supports indexed access (such as and ), this class uses it. 否則，它會使用列舉值所建立方法。Otherwise, it uses the enumerator created by the method. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||00| ||1010| ||00|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowCustomPaging { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出資料繫結控制項中是否啟用自訂分頁。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether custom paging is enabled in a data-bound control.

value.span: 如果啟用自訂分頁，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if custom paging is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，指出是否已啟用自訂分頁。Use the property to indicate whether custom paging is enabled. 自訂分頁是選擇性的特別所提供的分頁類型控制項。Custom paging is an optional type of paging provided specifically by the control. ASP.NET 2.0 版資料繫結控制項 (例如， ，和) 會使用伺服器端分頁，並不支援自訂分頁。ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound control (such as , , and ) uses server-side paging and does not support custom paging. 自訂分頁和伺服器端分頁會互斥。Custom paging and server-side paging are mutually exclusive. 如果您設定至`true`、 確定設`false`。If you set to `true`, be sure that is set to `false`. 如需有關自訂分頁的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about custom paging, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowPaging { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出資料繫結控制項中是否啟用分頁。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether paging is enabled in a data-bound control.

value.span: 如果啟用分頁，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if paging is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定資料繫結控制項是否擁有分頁已啟用。Use the property to specify whether a data-bound control has paging enabled. ASP.NET 2.0 版資料繫結控制項 (例如， ，和) 也使用伺服器端分頁提供自動分頁功能。ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound controls (such as , , and ) also use server-side paging to provide automatic paging functionality. 如需有關伺服器端分頁的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on server-side paging, see . 當使用控制項，您可以提供您自己的自訂分頁邏輯。When using the control, you can also provide your own custom paging logic. 如需有關自訂分頁的詳細資訊，請參閱和。For more information on custom paging, see and . 如需資料繫結控制項的分頁支援的詳細資訊，請參閱`AllowPaging`資料繫結控制項的屬性。For more information about paging support for data-bound controls, see the `AllowPaging` property of the data-bound control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowServerPaging { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用伺服器端分頁。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether server-side paging is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用伺服器端分頁，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if server-side paging is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 2.0 版資料繫結控制項 (例如， ，和) 提供自動的分頁功能，透過伺服器端分頁。ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound controls (such as , , and ) provide automatic paging functionality through server-side paging. 使用 ASP.NET 2.0 資料繫結控制項，此屬性設定為`true`。When using an ASP.NET 2.0 data-bound control, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 伺服器端分頁和自訂分頁會互斥。Server-side paging and custom paging are mutually exclusive. 如果您設定至`true`、 確定設`false`。If you set to `true`, be sure that is set to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (Array array, int index);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CopyTo(class System.Array array, int32 index) cil managed
public: virtual void CopyTo(Array ^ array, int index);

param.name: array
param.span: 以零起始的 ，接受從資料來源複製來的項目。

span.span: A zero-based that receives the copied items from the data source.

param.name: index
param.span: 指定 中的第一個位置，將接收複製來的內容。

span.span: The first position in the specified to receive the copied contents.

summary.span: 從 中的指定索引開始，將所有的項目從資料來源複製到指定的 。

span.span: Copies all the items from the data source to the specified , starting at the specified index in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法，將資料來源的內容複製到指定指定索引處開始。Use this method to copy the contents of the data source into the specified , starting at the specified index. 通常用來逐一查看資料來源中的項目。The is often used to iterate through the items in the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 從資料來源取得要使用的項目數。

span.span: Gets the number of items to be used from the data source.

value.span: 資料來源中要使用的項目數。

span.span: The number of items to be used from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷要從資料來源使用的項目數。Use the property to determine the number of items to be used from the data source. 傳回的值取決於是否啟用分頁，以及是否使用自訂分頁。The value returned depends on whether paging is enabled and whether custom paging is used. - 如果已停用分頁 (藉由設定屬性`false`)，值會傳回屬性。If paging is disabled (by setting the property to `false`), the value of the property is returned. - 如果啟用分頁 (藉由設定屬性`true`)，且已啟用自訂分頁 (藉由設定屬性設定為`true`)，值會傳回屬性。If paging is enabled (by setting the property to `true`) and custom paging is enabled (by setting the property set to `true`), the value of the property is returned. - 如果啟用分頁 (藉由設定屬性`true`) 和屬性設定為`false`，值會傳回屬性。If paging is enabled (by setting the property to `true`) and the property is set to `false`, the value of the property is returned. - 如果啟用分頁 (藉由設定屬性`true`)，會啟用自訂分頁 (藉由設定屬性`false`)，而屬性設定為`true`，值屬性的值減去傳回之前的屬性。If paging is enabled (by setting the property to `true`), custom paging is disabled (by setting the property `false`), and the property is set to `true`, the value of the property is subtracted from the value of the property before it is returned. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性包含`null`，就會傳回 0。If the property contains `null`, 0 is returned.

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the current page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或判斷目前頁面的索引。Use the property to specify or determine the index of the current page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Collections::IEnumerable ^ DataSource { System::Collections::IEnumerable ^ get(); void set(System::Collections::IEnumerable ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定資料來源。

span.span: Gets or sets the data source.

value.span: 實作的物件，表示資料來源。

span.span: A implemented object that represents the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或判斷正在呼叫資料來源。Use the property to specify or determine the data source being paged.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DataSourceCount As Integer
public: property int DataSourceCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得資料來源中的項目數目。

span.span: Gets the number of items in the data source.

value.span: 資料來源中的項目數目。

span.span: The number of items in the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷資料來源中的項目數。Use the property to determine the number of items in the data source. 如果使用自訂分頁或伺服器端分頁，則值會傳回屬性; 否則傳回的資料來源中的項目總數。If custom paging or server-side paging is used, the value of the property is returned; otherwise, the total number of items in the data source is returned. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性包含`null`，就會傳回 0。If the property contains `null`, 0 is returned.

exception.span: 資料來源不是 實作的物件。

span.span: The data source is not an implemented object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FirstIndexInPage As Integer
public: property int FirstIndexInPage { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得顯示在頁面上第一個記錄的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the first record displayed on the page.

value.span: 顯示在頁面上第一個記錄的索引。

span.span: The index of the first record displayed on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷目前的頁面上的第一個項目的索引。Use the property to determine the index of the first item on the current page. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為`false`，或或屬性會設為`true`，或屬性包含`null`，就會傳回 0。If the property is set to `false`, or the or properties are set to `true`, or the property contains `null`, 0 is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回 實作的物件，其中包含資料來源中所有的項目。

span.span: Returns a implemented object that contains all items in the data source.

returns.span: 實作的物件，包含資料來源中所有的項目。

span.span: A implemented object that contains all items in the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來建立，可以可重複查看資料來源中取得每個項目。Use this method to create a that can be iterated through to get each item in the data source. 若要存取目前列舉值位置的項目，請使用屬性。To access the item at the current position in the enumerator, use the property. 使用移至下一個項目，集合中的方法。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 若要將列舉值移到它的初始位置，使用方法。To move the enumerator to its initial position, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 當您一開始取得列舉值，或使用方法，將列舉值移至第一個項目在集合中，您必須呼叫方法。When you initially get the enumerator or use the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection, you must call the method. 否則，項目會由未定義屬性。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出資料來源是否為唯讀。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the data source is read-only.
for all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個屬性永遠傳回`false`，表示可以修改在所有情況下的資料來源。This property is implemented to always return `false`, which indicates that the data source can be modified in all cases.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsServerPagingEnabled As Boolean
public: property bool IsServerPagingEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否啟用伺服器端分頁支援。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether server-side paging support is enabled.

value.span: 如果已啟用分頁，並且使用 屬性表示伺服器端分頁，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if paging is enabled and server-side paging is indicated using the property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用伺服器端分頁時和屬性都設定為`true`，且無法在單一頁面中顯示的資料來源擷取的資料量。Server-side paging is enabled when the and properties are both set to `true`, and the amount of data retrieved by the data source cannot be displayed in a single page.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出對資料來源的存取是否為同步 (安全執行緒)。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the data source is synchronized (thread-safe).
for all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性衍生自類別並覆寫成一律會傳回`false`來指示此類別不具備執行緒安全。This property is derived from the class and is overridden to always return `false` to indicate that this class is not thread-safe. 如需有關屬性，請參閱屬性介面。For more information on the property, see the property of the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageCount As Integer
public: property int PageCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得顯示資料來源中所有項目所需的頁面總數。

span.span: Gets the total number of pages necessary to display all items in the data source.

value.span: 顯示資料來源中所有項目所需的頁面總數。

span.span: The number of pages necessary to display all items in the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷資料來源中顯示所有項目所需的頁面數目。Use the property to determine the number of pages necessary to display all items in the data source. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性是`null`，就會傳回 0。If the property is `null`, 0 is returned. 如果屬性設定為`false`或屬性設定為 0 或更少，則傳回 1。If the property is set to `false` or the property is set to 0 or less, 1 is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int VirtualCount { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 在使用自訂分頁時，取得或設定資料來源中項目的虛擬數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the virtual number of items in the data source when custom paging is used.

span.span: The virtual number of items in the data source when custom paging is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷虛擬數目的資料來源中的項目使用自訂分頁或伺服器端分頁時。Use the property when custom paging or server-side paging is used to determine the virtual number of items in the data source. 如需有關屬性，請參閱。For more information on the property, see .
